org.openjfx.controller

Class DocumentGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openjfx.controller.DocumentGenerator

  • public class DocumentGenerator
extends java.lang.Object
    Creates Word documents or Excel documents, which are needed for operational or report purposes.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DocumentGenerator()
      Default Constructor

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void createDirectoriesIfNeeded()
      Checks for and creates the needed directories for documents for the current session, if needed.
      void generateAttendanceList()
      Generates and saves an excel sheet with all trainee names, as well as their attendance hours.
      void generateAveryList()
      Generates and saves an excel sheet with all trainee first names, last names, and district/sector.
      void generateCertificates()
      Generates the Certificates for all trainees in the session.
      void generateCurrentRankings()
      Generates a list displaying the trainees in order of ranking, with their total scores and total percentage.
      void generateEmailList()
      Generates an email list for the session.
      void generateEmergencyContactRoster()
      Generates a roster of trainees with their emergency contact information next to it.
      void generateLodgingList()
      Generates list of all trainees who need lodging and their information for the session.
      void generateRoster()
      Generates a list of all trainees.
      void generateTestAnalysis()
      Creates a sheet that displays statistics about each taken test.
      void generateTraineeProfiles()
      Creates an excel doc that prints out each trainee's profile picture, name, and district.
      void generateUniformForm()
      Generates the uniform order list for the session.
      void preProcessDistrictSummaries(District selectedDistrict)
      Handles sorting the trainees into their district or all districts before generating the summaries.
      void preProcessIndividualSummaries(Trainee selectedTrainee)
      Handles the Individual Summary process.

      • generateTraineeProfiles

        public void generateTraineeProfiles()
        Creates an excel doc that prints out each trainee's profile picture, name, and district. 4 profiles per page

      • preProcessIndividualSummaries

        public void preProcessIndividualSummaries(Trainee selectedTrainee)
        Handles the Individual Summary process. To reduce execution time, this function will run first always, and then will either generate the selected trainee's individual summary, or it will create the individual summary for every trainee. This function will find the overall rankings, as well as percent of course complete, and
        Parameters:
        selectedTrainee -

        Parameters:
